Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted and offers unparalleled value in its category. Given its quality and uniqueness, it is worth significantly more than what most would pay for it. Considering its true worth and the benefits it provides, I am offering it to you for $12,000. This price not only reflects its high value but also presents an opportunity for you to acquire something truly special at a competitive rate. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $12,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $12,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
